bibl.title: The Baths of the Ancient Harbour of Marea.
Sesto Congresso internazionale di Egittologia. Atti. I
bibl.author: SADEK, Mahmoud

bibl.note: A study of the thermae at Marea reveals some distinctive characteristics of a provincial Roman public bath in the late Roman and early Byzantine periods.
SADEK Mahmoud, The Baths of the Ancient Harbour of Marea.
Sesto Congresso internazionale di Egittologia. Atti. I (Torino, 1992) pp. 549-554, 6 figg.
